title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 461.6 - Fees for copies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 461.6 - Fees for copies

State Regulations
(a) No fee
shall be charged for inspecting records. (b) The following fees shall be charged for
copying records except where a different fee is prescribed by statute: (1)

Paper copies (9 inches by 14 inches)
shall be assessed at $.25/per side of each sheet of paper. (2)

All others copies shall be assessed at
the actual cost of reproducing the record. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
461.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
